name: Garlic Toast Slices
recipeIngredient: 24 thin slices crusty French bread, preferably cut from a small round loaf
2 cloves garlic, peeled and cut in half

recipeInstructions.text: Brush each slice of bread on both sides with melted butter. Arrange the slices on a baking sheet and place in the oven. Bake five to seven minutes or longer until bread is crisp and lightly browned.
Rub each slice with a cut clove of garlic and serve warm.
